sentence: What do you call a trucker that doesnt drive anymore? semi-retired.
explanation: Semi can refer to something that is partly or in-between (like semi-automatic) and also refers to a type of trailer truck.
first_new_sentence: The truck driver works part-time, using his semi-truck occasionally.
second_new_sentence: The semi-final of the competition will take place this weekend.

sentence: What kind of bee can you milk? a boobie..
explanation: Milk can refer to the liquid produced by mammals for their young as well as to extract a liquid substance from something.
first_new_sentence: The farmer used a machine to milk the cows every morning.
second_new_sentence: I learned how to milk almonds to make a delicious dairy-free alternative.

sentence: Why did the sperm cross the road? cause i put on the wrong sock this morning
explanation: Sock can refer to an item of clothing that is worn on the foot and also means to hit someone.
first_new_sentence: I lost my favorite sock in the laundry and now I have a mismatch.
second_new_sentence: He decided to sock the ball as hard as he could during the game.

sentence: Please note that the original wording of the jokes was edited for clarity and flow.
